mapper.update: update app_ar_customer_detail set ar_customer_detail_id = #{arCustomerDetailId}, customer_id = #{customerId}, date = #{date}, note = #{note}, debit = #{debit}, credit = #{credit}, debit_balance = #{debitBalance}, credit_balance = #{creditBalance}, balance = #{balance}, reference_no = #{referenceNo}, ar_due_date = #{arDueDate}, status = #{status} where ar_customer_detail_id = #{arCustomerDetailId};
